front.name: The Game
front.desc:
This is a game whose rules are on cards.
To add a rule, write a card.
Follow every rule on the cards on the table.

back.name: The Game
back.desc: See the other side for rules

front.name: The Facilitator
front.desc:
This game has no Facilitator (GM, MC, referee).
Resolve player disputes collectively.

back.name: The Facilitator
back.desc:
The game has a Facilitator (GM, MC, referee).
Facilitators have final authority over rules questions.
Whoever laid this card face up is the facilitator.

front.name: Challenges
front.desc:
If any player thinks the outcome of your narration is uncertain, you've been challenged.
Meet the challenge by getting a hit via some other rule.
If you don't, whoever posed the challenge narrates the outcome instead.

back.name: Challenges
back.desc: Resolve challenges strictly via narration.

front.name: Simple Dice
front.desc: The Simple Dice rule is not used in this game

back.name: Simple Dice
back.desc: If another rule says to meet a challenge, you can roll 1d6:

front.name: X-Card
front.desc: "I'd like your help. Your help to make this game fun for everyone. If anything makes anyone uncomfortable in any way, just lift this card up, or simply tap it. You don't have to explain why. It doesn't matter why. When we lift or tap this card, we simply edit out anything X-Carded."
front.rule: Read aloud, then flip this card

back.name: X-Card
back.desc: "And if there is ever an issue, anyone can call for a break and we can talk privately. I know it sounds funny but it will help us play amazing games together and usually I'm the one who uses the X card to protect myself from all of you! Please help make this game fun for everyone. Thank you!"
back.rule: Lay this card at the center of the play area

front.name: Northerner
front.desc: Snow-swept peaks and narrow valleys are your home.
prompts: Deal with or take advantage of cold
Bury your emotions and move forward

back.name: Northerner
back.desc: They say your heart is frozen.

front.name: Southerner
front.desc: Fiery deserts and glittering oases are your home.
prompts: Deal with or take advantage of heat
Keep going when all seems lost
Inspire in the face of hardship

back.name: Southerner
back.desc: They say the desert has burned weakness out of you.
prompts: Uphold a complex code of honor
Make an expedient but cruel choice
Stand by your group, right or wrong

front.name: Easterner
front.desc: Mysterious mountains and river-lands are your home.
prompts: Share the wisdom of past generations

back.name: Easterner
back.desc: They say you are distant and arrogant.
prompts: Follow your own ways in strange lands
Extol the virtues of your own culture

front.name: Westerner
front.desc: Islands, archipelagos, and boats are your home.
prompts: Deal with or take advantage of water

back.name: Westerner
back.desc: They say you're unreliable or untrustworthy.

front.name: City Folk
front.desc: Big cities, centers of knowledge and trade, are your home.
prompts: Get around in crowded or complex areas
Use a lesson the city taught you
Find a guy who knows a guy

back.name: City Folk
back.desc: They say you've sold your soul to the city.

front.name: Country Folk
front.desc: Villages, farms, and manors are your home.
prompts: Work with the land and animals
Do what common sense tells you

back.name: Country Folk
back.desc: They look down on you as rustic bumpkins.

front.name: Forest Folk
front.desc: Trappers' camps and green silences are your home.
prompts: Live and thrive in the wilderness
Find a path to your goal

back.name: Forest Folk
back.desc: They say you're creepy and aloof.
prompts: Refuse offers of aid or comfort
Keep an outsider distant from you

front.name: Scraplander
front.desc: Haunted wastelands and blasted heaths are your home.
prompts: Deal with or take advantage of remnants of old wars and lost magic
Reveal a useful item or experience

back.name: Scraplander
back.desc: They say you're no better than the trash you gather.
prompts: Express a dangerous or weird quirk

front.name: Dreamer
front.desc: Tomorrow beckons, if you can fix today. You can't change the world alone. But you aren't, are you?
prompts: Remind someone of their best self
Light a candle to spite the darkness
Defy what's possible with what's necessary

back.name: Dreamer
back.desc: When the gulf between is and ought becomes too much, which will you choose?
prompts: Reject the real, denounce the realist
Lose sight of your dream for a time

front.name: Guardian
front.desc: You feel responsible for something or someone else. Their need propels you.
prompts: Keep your charge safe from something

back.name: Guardian
back.desc: You control that which depends on you, and sometimes the weight grows too much.
prompts: Shut down your feelings or shut out your charge

front.name: Monster
front.desc: Your looks, reputation, or nature cause common folk to fear or reject you.
prompts: Exploit the source of your monstrousness
Make common cause with other monsters

back.name: Monster
back.desc: To be the thing they say you are. How easy to do it accidentally. How tempting to choose it.
prompts: Make everything worse for yourself or an ally

front.name: Opportunist
front.desc: Life is unpredictable. When an opening comes, seize it. When a chance comes, take it.
prompts: Take a risk nobody else would

back.name: Opportunist
back.desc: There's only so much good luck to go around. Will you run out of yours, or take someone else's away?
prompts: Let someone else pay the price

front.name: Performer
front.desc: Through actions and words, you entertain, persuade, or transform people around you.

back.name: Performer
back.desc: When anything you say matters, will you say the wrong thing, or for the wrong reasons?
prompts: Show up or embarrass someone important

front.name: Quester
front.desc: A vow, an ideal, a promise, a vision, a mission. Something drives you unstoppably onward.
prompts: Live the life your resolve demands
Find a way forward despite everything

back.name: Quester
back.desc: That which is greater than you can also crush you beneath it.
prompts: Waver in your dedication to your quest
Shut others out of assisting you
Put your quest before more mundane matters

front.name: Soldier
front.desc: Life is struggle. Everyone has to fight, all the time. What do you fight for?
prompts: Test your fate against an opponent
Make a sacrifice to support a hope
Stand up when everything says to stay down

back.name: Soldier
back.desc: Life is pain. There's no reward for this, only the next battle. When will you fall?
prompts: Lash out at an easy target

front.name: Synthesist
front.desc: You create, fix, and remix.
prompts: Make something new out of what's available
Bring creativity to bear against a problem

back.name: Synthesist
back.desc: What or who will you unmake, in your goal of making something new?
prompts: Tear down something valuable or important
Keep something going at great cost

front.name: Condition Cards
front.desc: Cards with this icon indicate an ongoing physical, mental, social, magical, etc. condition for a character.
prompts: Generate a hit by taking on a new condition
Generate a hit by aggravating a condition (flip over)
Topside: discard after spending a scene attending to condition
Flipside: discard by spending downtime doing so

back.name: Condition Cards
back.desc: Condition cards have no effect

front.name: Hurt
front.desc: You've been bloodied, bruised, stunned, or otherwise physically harmed.

back.name: Wounded
back.desc: Your injuries are severe. You must get medical attention soon.

front.name: Weakened
front.desc: You've exerted yourself, or been mildly hurt, and need time to rest.

back.name: Exhausted
back.desc: Every step is an effort. You need not just rest, but healing.

front.name: Obliged
front.desc: You've incurred an important responsibility.

back.name: Indebted
back.desc: You have significant debts that demand your time or attention.

front.name: Wanted
front.desc: Someone powerful or dangerous is interested in you.

back.name: Pursued
back.desc: You're being chased, by someone or something that wishes you ill.

front.name: Magicked
front.desc: A spell or other power is affecting you.

back.name: Cursed
back.desc: A powerful and baneful magic has you in its grip.

front.name: Mutated
front.desc: You've been physically changed by magic or an artifact.

back.name: Transformed
back.desc: You've been physically remade into something new, but not forever.

front.name: Disarmed
front.desc: Vital gear you depend on has been damaged or taken

back.name: Broken
back.desc: Vital gear you depend on is unavailable and must be replaced

front.name: Hindered
front.desc: A sense or faculty you normally depend on has been weakened due to injury, magic, or stress.
prompts: Unable to clearly see or hear

back.name: Impeded
back.desc: A sense or faculty you normally depend on has been temporarily lost.
